start.text: Bring the chicken to room temperature and pat dry with a paper towel

route.text: Brought the chicken to room temperature
I brought the chicken to room temperature and pat dried with a paper towel

1.text: Pat dry the chicken with paper towel

route.text: Pat dried the chicken with a paper towel
With a paper towel I pat dried the chicken

2.text: Mix 1 teaspoon of kosher salt to a bowl, 1 teaspoon of garlic powder, 1 teaspoon of smoked paprika, 1 spoon of onion powder, half teaspoon of ground black pepper in a bowl

route.text: In a bowl I mixed 1 teaspoon of kosher salt to a bowl, 1 teaspoon of garlic powder, 1 teaspoon of smoked paprika, 1 spoon of onion powder, half teaspoon of ground black pepper

3.text: Did you mix 1 teaspoon of kosher salt to a bowl, 1 teaspoon of garlic powder, 1 teaspoon of smoked paprika, 1 spoon of onion powder, half teaspoon of ground black pepper in a bowl?

4.text: Sprinkle the mixture all over the chicken

route.text: I sprinkled the mixture all over the chicken

5.text: Did you sprinkle the mixture all over the chicken?

6.text: Cook the chicken in the grill for 35 minutes

route.text: In the grill I cooked the chicken for 35 minutes
Cooked the chicken in a grill for 20 minutes
Cooked the chicken in the grill

8.text: Did you cook the chicken for 15 minutes?
